title: Justice Kagan Temporarily Blocks a Jan. 6 Committee Subpoena
description: The justice’s “administrative stay” of a subpoena for an Arizona Republican’s phone records was not an indication of how the Supreme Court would rule.
dc:creator: Adam Liptak
category: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack
media:description: Justice Elena Kagan ordered the committee to respond to an emergency application from Kelli Ward, the chairwoman of the Arizona Republican Party, by Friday.
